name: UpdateHubspotMeeting
description:
Update specific properties of a HubSpot meeting.

Use this tool to perform a partial update on a HubSpot CRM meeting object. Identify the meeting using `{meetingId}` or a unique property with `idProperty`. Overwrite specified property values, but note that read-only or non-existent properties will cause an error. Properties can be cleared by sending an empty string.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the meeting or a property name with unique values for identification.

parameters.name: meeting_update_properties
parameters.description: JSON object with key-value pairs for meeting properties to update. Keys are property names, values are new property values.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The name of the unique property for identifying the meeting.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
